entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. A few showers beginning late this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High 23. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023
